p:
The following equation was used to measure the inhibitory effect of the CEO against β‐carotene‐linoleate solution bleaching:
Inhibitory effect
( % )
=
A S(120)
‐
A C(120)
A C(0)
‐
A C(120)
× 100 ,
where, A S(120) is the absorbance of the solution at 490 nm after 120 min incubation, A C(0) is the absorbance of control at the time zero, and A C(0) is the absorbance of control at the after 120 min reaction.
